channel.title: Payment on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Payment on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: How to swap ICY to BTC
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Guide to Swapping ICY to BTC Before You Begin Make sure you have a Bitcoin (BTC) wallet ready to receive the BTC after the swap.

item.title: How to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you can withdraw ICY, please make sure that you have already had the crypto wallet and Binance wallet. If you don’t have any, please follow this guideline.
